title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS migration journey: 2025 itinerary for Microsoft workloads (MAM309)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 迁移之旅：Microsoft 工作负载的 2025 年路线图 (MAM309)
abstract: Ready to take your Microsoft migration journey to the next level in a world of AI-based tools? Join us for a session that showcases migration tools, mechanisms, and new ways to speed up your Microsoft ecosystem migrations on AWS. Whether you're migrating Active Directory, File Servers, Application Servers, or SQL databases, discover how to transform your landscape with precision and confidence. Learn firsthand how these services and solutions streamline complex migrations, reduce manual effort, and accelerate your migration journey.
abstract_cn: 准备好在AI工具的世界中将您的Microsoft迁移之旅提升到新水平吗？加入我们的会议，展示迁移工具、机制以及在AWS上加速Microsoft生态系统迁移的新方法。无论您是在迁移Active Directory、文件服务器、应用程序服务器还是SQL数据库，都可以了解如何精确且自信地转换您的环境。亲身了解这些服务和解决方案如何简化复杂的迁移、减少手动工作并加速您的迁移之旅。
